Wisdom Council

Joe Foxton

Throughout my life, I have always searched for ways to express my skills and experience for good, from my Emmy-award winning work to democratise TV & Film production, to many years working for a left-wing TV news network, to running a food business accelerator aimed at fixing the broken food system, to hosting music events for charity. In ThreeFold I’ve found the ultimate mission of my career; a chance to truly have an impact on the future of humankind. It feels like my entire career has led up to this point, and I’m thrilled to have finally arrived.



Green Edge

Creating a decentralised internet that is inherently equal, sustainable, private and secure.
